channel.title: Newsletter on Hobo Disc Golf
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletter on Hobo Disc Golf

item.title: Weekly Newsletter: 06
item.description: All Tags In! Hobo DG ALL Tags In Event has been scheduled! Oct 7, at East La Loma in Modesto, join your fellow Hobo Disc Golfers or pick yourself up a new tag and let’s have some fun! Register today here Upcoming Hobo DG Bag Tag Events Date Location Event Time Jul 16 Micke Grove, Lodi Casual Tag Round 10:00 AM TBD TBD Casual Tag Round 10:00 AM Oct 7 East La Loma, Modesto All Tags In TBD Hobo DG Bag Tag Top 5 Tag Player 1 Chris Brobisky 2 Steven Kendrick 3 Wesley Webster 4 Alex Mauche 5 Lucas Bischofberger Flick and Roll Our new board has a name, Flick and Roll.

item.title: Weekly Newsletter: 05
item.description: Thanks to those that were able to make it out last week to our first casual tag meetup. Below is the upcoming schedule for the next meet-ups, hope to see you there! We’re still plugging away on the game(s) and putting pieces together to pump up the bag tag rounds as well as trying to get an end of the year All Tags In event going, potentially in October. Be sure to keep an eye out here or on our socials to stay up to date.

item.title: Weekly Newsletter: 04
item.description: Hobo Disc Golf Bag Tag Kick-Off! The tags have been seeded with the first 50 Hobo Disc Golfers. A huge thank you to all that were able to come out and support the AM Rush! Be sure to head over to our IG page for more from the event. You should also subscribe to the YouTube channel Community Parked for great disc golf content and more from the AM Rush tornament and Hobo DG Bag Tag kick off.

item.title: Weekly Newsletter: 03
item.description: BREAKING NEWS!! Hobo Disc Golf has developed a new disc golf board game! Exciting news, we have developed a card and dice board game that is being productized now AND we have a second game that is currently in developement! We are so thrilled to be able to share these with you once they are ready to go, but in the meantime, keep an eye out on Twitter or IG for any updates.

item.title: Weekly Newsletter: 02
item.description: Hobo DG Bag Tag Top 5 Tag Hobo 1 coming soon 2 coming soon 3 coming soon 4 coming soon 5 coming soon Hobo Disc Golf Bag Tag Kick-Off! Register for the AM Rush and kick-off the inagural Hobo DG Bag Tag event! Still Room Left TOURNEY HOBO DG EVENT? 3rd Annual NorCal Am Jam N The Levi Memorial N 2023 Zambia Disc Golf Fundraiser Series N AM Rush Y A look back at the Week Hobo Joe was lucky enough to participate in the Sierra Spring Cup hosted by the Tuolumne Disc Golf Club at Three Links Camp.

item.title: Hobo DG Weekly: 01
item.description: Hobo DG Bag Tag Top 5 Tag Hobo 1 coming soon 2 coming soon 3 coming soon 4 coming soon 5 coming soon Hobo Disc Golf Bag Tag Kick-Off! Register for the AM Rush and kick-off the inagural Hobo DG Bag Tag event! Still Room Left TOURNEY HOBO DG EVENT? 2023 NADGT Exclusive @ Hanging Oaks N Auburn Open N 3rd Annual NorCal Am Jam N The Levi Memorial N AM Rush Y A look back at the Week This past week saw the ever-entertaining May the 4th come and go.
